State_Notes: [Oct 31, 2021]:”The tested figures are being picked up from the ‘Person Tested’ column instead of ‘’Total Samples Collected’ as was done previously (prior to 31st October 2021). This will entail a change in moving averages and trends of testing figures for the state

[Dec 05, 2021]:”The Bihar government on Friday revised its Covid-19 death toll, adding a “backlog” of 2,424 deaths that had earlier gone unaccounted for. This will entail a spike in cumulative death counts and moving averages for the state

State: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
